#define ZIG(x) 1. - abs(1. - 2. * fract(x))
#define TURN 6.283185
#define ANGLEVEC(theta) vec2(cos(theta), sin(theta))

float map(float minv, float maxv, float x) {
    if (minv == maxv) {return 0.;}
    return (x - minv) / (maxv - minv);
}

float biaszig(float x, float bias) {
    x = fract(x);
    return mix(
        map(0.0, bias, x),
        map(1.0, bias, x),
        step(bias, x)
    );
}

#define STEPPED(x, y) (floor(x * (y+1.)) / y)

#define SPEED (1. / 5.)

#define SUCK 4.

#define SPIN -0.25

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    float t = fract(iTime * SPEED);

    vec2 uv = (2. * fragCoord - iResolution.xy) / length(iResolution.xy);
    float dist = length(uv);
    float angle = atan(uv.y, uv.x) / TURN;
    
    float randt = (t - 0.5) * 0.45;
    uint rand0 = uint(
        floor(
            8.0 * (
                tan(randt * TURN) - .9 * randt * TURN
            )
        ) + 1048576.
    ) & 255u;
    uint rand1 = rand[rand0];
    uint rand2 = rand[rand1];
    uint rand3 = rand[rand2];
    
    // two cross-axis stripes
    float choose = ZIG((angle - t * SPIN) * 2. + dist * 0.25);
    float chooseaa = max(0.001, min(0.125, fwidth(choose)));
    choose = clamp(map(
        -chooseaa,
        chooseaa,
        choose - 0.5
    ),0., 1.);
    
    float r0 = SUCK * t + log2(0.004 + abs(
        dot(
            uv, ANGLEVEC((t * SPIN - 0.125) * TURN)
        )
    ));
    float v0 = biaszig(r0, min(0.5, fwidth(r0)));
    float r1 = SUCK * t + log2(0.004 + abs(
        dot(
            uv, ANGLEVEC((t * SPIN + 0.125) * TURN)
        )
    ));
    float v1 = biaszig(r1, min(0.5, fwidth(r1)));
    
    for (uint i = 0u; i < 3u; i++) {
        if ((rand0 & 7u) == (rand1 & 7u)) {
            rand1 += rand0 - 1u;
        }
        if ((rand2 & 7u) == (rand3 & 7u)) {
            rand3 += rand2 - 1u;
        }
    }
    
    vec3 col0dark = vec3(uvec3(rand0) >> uvec3(2u, 1u, 0u) & 1u);
    vec3 col0light = vec3(uvec3(rand1) >> uvec3(2u, 1u, 0u) & 1u);
    vec3 col1dark = vec3(uvec3(rand2) >> uvec3(2u, 1u, 0u) & 1u);
    vec3 col1light = vec3(uvec3(rand3) >> uvec3(2u, 1u, 0u) & 1u);
    
    vec3 col0 = mix(col0dark, col0light, v0);
    vec3 col1 = mix(col1dark, col1light, v1);
    
    vec3 col = STEPPED(mix(col0, col1, choose), 32.);
    
//    col = vec3(v0);
    
    // Output to screen
    fragColor = vec4(col,1.0);
}
renderpass.name: Image
